page.title: 07Life in Clifton Today
page.content: Because of its geographical situation,many of the adult population of the village travel into Rugby to find employment. In our class,4 of our parents worked for the various divisions of G.E.C.,8 worked for different companies in Rugby and 9 travelled to London,Birmingham,Leicester,Warwick and Coventry. Only 14 children in the class lived near to their grandparents and 17 children had moved into Clifton and had not been born there. Eight children were able to walk to school from their homes,the other 16 children either travelled in their parents'cars or came by bus. The school is small but 23 children thought that there were definite advantages in this.
